content.rendered:
Directed by Chandra Prakash Dwivedi

Written by Kashinath Singh

Cast Sunny Deol (Dharamnath Pandey). Sakshi Tanwar (Savitri Pandey). Ravi Kishan (Kanni Guru Guide). Saurabh Shukla (Upadhyay Pandit). Rajendra Gupta (Srivastavaji). Seema Azmi (Ramdin – Barbar’s Wife) . Syed Iqbal Ahmad (Old Brahmin teacher). Alex (Christopher). Alice (Jane). Alisha (Catherine). Ambrish (Ashok). Ishtiyaq Ansari (Cycle Rickshawala). Arihant (Ram Singh). Lal Baba (Slate Baba). Vishwa Badola (S.P mishra). Urvashi Singh Bhadli (Gargi 6 yrs). Burman (Paanwala). Mithilesh Chaturvedi (Gaya Singh (as Mithiliesh Chaturvedi)). Pradeep Chaudhry (Inspector Sharma). Ashok Devalia (Pappu). Yeshna Dhar (Pandey ji’s daughter). Narayan Dravid (Shaligram Tiwari). Vijay Gupta (Sadhu). Jyotilal (Boatman). Vijay Kumar (Rajkishore). Shreechand Makhija (Chaubey). Srichand Makhija (Chaubey ji). Dev Malhotra (Sahodar ji). Sanjay Mehta (Deenbandhu Tiwari). Michaela (Mekhela). Akhilendra Mishra (Tanni Maharaj). Abhilash Narain (Chief of Akhada). Dayashankar Pandey (Shiv Impostor). Hari Om Parashar (Mithai lal gupt). Yash Parmar (Pandey’s younger son). Gyan Prakash (Ramji Rai). Ram Padarath Rai (Haridwar Pandey). Shambhu Ranjan (Worker). Raquel (Foreign Sex worker).Faisal Rashid. Abner Reginald (Srivastav Senior). Gautam Saugat (Baldev). Brijbhushan Sawhney (Kashinath Singh). Anil Saxena (Late Tiwari ji). Ashok Seth (Chaturvedi). Ansh Avinash Sharma (Pandey Ji’s Elder Son). Dinesh Sharma (Jaggu). Mohd. Aslam Sheikh (Auto driver). Shiv (Srivastav junior). Amit K. Sinha (Manoj (as Amit Kumar)). Mohit Sinha (Laxman Singh). Sofia (Madeline). Ambrish Srivastava (Man (credit only)). Ajay Thapa (Traffic Policeman). Manish Tiwari (Yajmaan). Mukesh Tiwari (Radheyshyam). Satish Tiwari (Muftanni). Rati Shankar Tripathi (Panchayat Member). Vinamra Tripathi (Pandey’s elder son). Yashwant Vasnik (Nayeem). Vijay Wahal (Thakur Ramjas Singh)

Language Hindi

Producers Mandira Kashyap. Rajeev Sharma. Yogiraj Shetty. Vinay Tiwari

Production Crossword Entertainment
